column4: guys, how do i know which whether my Fx is 64-bit Fx or 32-bit Fx?
Fx?
firefox
if youre using 32bit ubuntu it's 32bit firefox. if its 64bit ubuntu, it's 64bit firefox
I just want to make sure since youtube playbacks is not working on my browser
install flashplugin-nonfree and restart your browser
I've intalled flash, I got the sound and video, but left clicks don't work. Or flashplugin-nonfree is another thing :/
ooooo ok thats a known bug
i think it only happens if you use compiz, right? im trying to remember as i dont hit it. i think you need to hold shift or ctrl while clicking
ok, i'll try it. :D
it's actually the left and middle click at the same time. It works, few times. Thanks anyway.
careful youre not thinking of AWN ;)
LOL, what's WM anyway? D:
window manager
AWN = Avant Window Navigator
AWN is a dock
any window manager?
yes, WM is jsut short for "window manager"
so you can say "my wm is fluxbox" or "i use xmonad for my wm"
note also that a desktop environment and a window manager are different. GNOME, Xfce, and KDE are all DE's. their respective default WMs are metacity, xfwm4, and kwin
that's clear stuffs! thanks :)
